html: For centuries, Notre Dame Cathedral has withstood wars, revolutions, and the test of time. It is a symbol of faith & a testament to history. And even as our hearts break to see it burn today during the holiest week of the year for Catholics, I have faith that it will rise again.

text:
At today’s #FamilySeparation hearing, we learned:
 
1. The Trump Administration is still separating families at the border.
2. They aren’t telling families why they’re being separated.
3. They still have no system to track where kids are going.
 
This is an unmitigated disaster.

html: The brave have many admirers, And the kind, a life filled with family and friends, The wise understand the frailty of human nature and the breadth of the company they keep, Only the bully must live alone, with his cowardice.
text:
The brave have many admirers,

And the kind, a life filled with family and friends,

The wise understand the frailty of human nature and the breadth of the company they keep,

Only the bully must live alone,
with his cowardice.
